theme_park

		# theme_park
		# rollecoaster
		# vortex
	
	
on

		
session 1

			docker compose up -d; docker exec -it theme_park.1 bash;
			source /habitat/_controls/build_1.sh
			cd /habitat/venues/_contructions/
			theme_park_1
		
		
session 2

			docker exec -it theme_park.1 bash
			source /habitat/_controls/build_2.sh

	

	
publishing

		
		#
		#	statuses
		#
		python3 /habitat/venues/stages/theme_park/_status/status.proc.py
		
		#
		#	git push
		#
		#		if Circle CI is successful, then publish
		#
		
		#
		#	increase version
		#
		
		#
		#	poetry auth
		#
		(pip install poetry && cd /habitat && rm -rf dist && poetry build --format sdist --verbose && chmod -R 777 /habitat && poetry publish --verbose;)


	

	
docker with custom IP address

		docker network create --subnet=192.168.0.0/24 bios_net
		docker run --network bios_net --ip 192.168.0.34 -v .:/theme_park -v /online/locker/vaccines_theme_park:/online/locker/vaccines_theme_park -it jumps:v2.1.0
		docker exec -it f524ed410d13 bash

	
dockers

		docker run -p 127.0.0.1:20000:20000 -v .:/theme_park -v /online/crowns_safes/mint:/online/crowns_safes/mint -it jumps:v2.1.0
		docker exec -it 598cd384d874 bash
